original_text: Jonathan asked David to promise again that they would be friends. That was because Jonathan loved David as much as he loved his own life.
korean_text: 다윗에 대한 요나단의 사랑이 그를 다시 맹세하게 하였으니 이는 자기 생명을 사랑함 같이 그를 사랑함이었더라

sentences.original_text: Jonathan asked David to promise again
That was because Jonathan loved David
as much as he loved his own life
